mapper.sql: traTradeProfit.id as traTradeProfit_id, traTradeProfit.gid as traTradeProfit_gid, traTradeProfit.merch_order_no as traTradeProfit_merch_order_no, traTradeProfit.trade_no as traTradeProfit_trade_no, traTradeProfit.profit_merch_order_no as traTradeProfit_profit_merch_order_no, traTradeProfit.pay_order_no as traTradeProfit_pay_order_no, traTradeProfit.amount as traTradeProfit_amount, traTradeProfit.status as traTradeProfit_status, traTradeProfit.profit_type as traTradeProfit_profit_type, traTradeProfit.create_time as traTradeProfit_create_time, traTradeProfit.update_time as traTradeProfit_update_time, traTradeProfit.trade_memo as traTradeProfit_trade_memo, traTradeProfit.memo as traTradeProfit_memo, traTradeProfit.partner_id as traTradeProfit_partner_id, traTradeProfit.charge_type as traTradeProfit_charge_type, traTradeProfit.trade_name as traTradeProfit_trade_name, traTradeProfit.profit_amount as traTradeProfit_profit_amount, traTradeProfit.payer_user_no as traTradeProfit_payer_user_no, traTradeProfit.payer_account_no as traTradeProfit_payer_account_no, traTradeProfit.payee_user_no as traTradeProfit_payee_user_no, traTradeProfit.payee_account_no as traTradeProfit_payee_account_no, traTradeProfit.clear_amount as traTradeProfit_clear_amount, traTradeProfit.type as traTradeProfit_type, traTradeProfit.period_no as traTradeProfit_period_no
